ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-05-17
          -TWG created for all measures proposing to create a central body for the water sector, to be chaired by Rep. Herrera-Dy
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2018-02-07
          -1st TWG meeting, secretariat instructed to request Com on Rules to jointly refer the water bills to the Coms on Public Works and Highways and Govt Reorg (lead)
      3. Recommendations submitted by the TWG on 2018-03-07
          -Letter to Com on Rules for water bills to be jointly referred to the Com on Govt Reorg (lead) and Coms on Govt Enteprises and Public Works and Highways (secondary)
